computer.coprocessor: MOS 65C02 (I/O board, essentially a BBC B+)
computer.description:
The ABC 110 had essentially the same technical features as the Cambridge Workstation ABC 210 apart from the main processor, which was a Z80 card instead of the 32016 card. It also had a 10 MB hard disk instead of 20 MB.
Thanks to Chris Whytehead for info and pictures.
